title: JCR: Evaluating Conflict Dynamics: A Novel Empirical Approach to Stage Conceptions
description: Paul Huth, editor of the Journal of Conflict Resolution, interviews authors Benjamin Jones and Shawna Metzger about their article, "Evaluating Conflict Dynamics: A Novel Empirical Approach to Stage Conceptions." They discuss research methods, challenges in the process, and future studies.
